mapper.insert: INSERT INTO user (uid, user_name, password, nickname, email, birth_date, phone_number, agree_privacy) VALUES (#{uid}, #{user_name}, #{password}, #{nickname}, #{email}, #{birth_date}, #{phone_number}, #{agree_privacy})
INSERT INTO auth_token (uid, user_uid, refresh_token, created_at) VALUES (#{uid}, #{userUid}, #{refreshToken}, NOW()) ON DUPLICATE KEY UPDATE refresh_token = #{refreshToken}, created_at = NOW()
mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM user WHERE email = #{email}
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM user WHERE nickname = #{nickname}
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM user WHERE phone_number = #{phone_number}
